abstract: Andy Murray defeats Philipp Kohlschreiber in BMW Open final, obtaining his first clay-court title; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Murray defeated Philipp Kohlschreiber, 7-6 (4), 5-7, 7-6 (4), in the rain-delayed final in Munich.

headline.main: Andy Murray Earns His First Title on Clay at the BMW Open
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Murray Earns His First Title on Clay

snippet: Murray defeated Philipp Kohlschreiber, 7-6 (4), 5-7, 7-6 (4), in the rain-delayed final in Munich.
